channel.title: Not Sure How aTo Explain But Please Read and help if u can!
channel.description: heya allz, i was wondering in all these newer clients how do u change the login bit not the actual background but the login bit with the server ip port etc etc, o yea and as for the @red@ or wteva in client.java were can i get a list for what codes make what colours, i am looking for a orange colour, any1 help would b greatly apprectiated. heres the pics of what i meen.

item.title: Not Sure How aTo Explain But Please Read and help if u can!
item.dc:creator: @Busta_Blader Busta Blader
item.description:
@Busta_Blader wrote:

well in the folder where the client is theres a .java called client or something its the main one…

Hit CTR+F and type “welcome to Pkerz Client” and it will have something like this:

“@red@welcome to Pkerz Client”

just change that to your client name and to change colours add different colours name remember its only the first three letters so: @red@, @blu@, @cya@ ect…

for changing the original port and such just search around.

Read full topic
